body_html:
We usually provide users with python wheels which we prepare it from source. 0.4.0 a0a appears in the name of the wheel that we provide to users and that is confusing for users. We could simply apply a patch after downloading, but I thought you maybe interested to know. I happen only in version 0.4.0.

Cheers,

Ata Roudgar
Research Computing
Computecanada Site
IT Services
Simon Fraser University
Burnaby, British Columbia
Canada V5A 1S6

phone: 778 782-8860
fax: 778 782-4242

body:
We usually provide users with python wheels which we prepare it from source. 0.4.0 a0a appears in the name of the wheel that we provide to users and that is confusing for users. We could simply apply a patch after downloading, but I thought you maybe interested to know. I happen only in version 0.4.0. 

 
Cheers,
